title: Provide a way to query for zookeeper quorum state and other cloud-related info
description: There should be a way, either through an existing admin handler or a new one, to get an up-to-the-moment zookeeper status.  There may be other status information related to SolrCloud that could be included as well.

comments.author: Shawn Heisey
comments.content: Stefan Matheis (steffkes) - A status screen in the UI for the zookeeper ensemble would be awesome.  Should that be a separate issue from this one?

comments.author: Stefan Matheis (steffkes)
comments.content: Shawn, i have no idea how that would/could/should look like? ;o But i'm pretty sure you already have a picture in mind, do you? Regarding to your question, i'd like to handle that one as a separated one, yes - enables us to handle those one by one w/o dependency

comments.author: Mark Miller
comments.content: It would also be great to somehow show the servers that are available but hosting no SolrCores yet.
